lyric: 作词 : TetraCalyx
作曲 : 宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : 宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
Wrapped in bitting wind
Hearts will never bleed
Frozen and banished
Out of grief
In their restless dreams
they try so hard to breathe
Pulses flutter and sting
Within this bleakness
Pain will come with the blade
Pain will wake up the despondent crowd in this dormant world somehow
translation: 伤痛会唤醒沉睡的世界中绝望的人们

lyric: Unsheathe a sword not to kill
translation: 剑刃出鞘并不是为了杀戮

lyric: Unsheathe a sword to rend those clouds above the ground
Wake up, it’s time to gather now
The only warmth remains in hands clasped so tight
translation: 温暖仅存于紧握的手心

lyric: The only fire exists in brave hearts
translation: 火种仅存于勇敢的内心

lyric: Seasons that refuse to change over the years
translation: 那些多年来拒绝变换的季节

lyric: Will find their way back, back on track
We’ve made a choice
Go fight against your fate!
Pain will come with the blade
Pain will wake up the despondent crowd in this dormant world somehow
translation: 伤痛会唤醒沉睡的世界中绝望的人们

lyric: Unsheathe a sword not to kill
translation: 剑刃出鞘并不是为了杀戮

lyric: Unsheathe a sword to rend those clouds above the ground
Wake up, it’s time to gather now
Forget about the rules written on weathered rock
translation: 忘掉写在风化岩石上的金科玉律吧

lyric: There were chasers of light
find the way or get lost
We have no way to know
Where they all headed for
See a light from afar
translation: 此刻我们看见了远处的光芒

lyric: Just blaze through the thorns
We know it’s right over there
We have something to declare
Whatever is arriving, we’ll be prepared
translation: 无论将面临什么，我们已准备好

lyric: We’ve made a choice
Go fight against your fate!
Pain will come with the blade
Pain will wake up the despondent crowd in this dormant world somehow
translation: 伤痛会唤醒沉睡的世界中绝望的人们

lyric: Unsheathe a sword not to kill
translation: 剑刃出鞘并不是为了杀戮

lyric: Unsheathe a sword to rend those clouds above the ground
Wake up to hear the cheering sound
歌手 Vocal Artist：Jonathan Steingard
吉他 Guitar：宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
录音棚 Recording Studio：Suho Studios
录音师 Recording Engineer：Mark Suhonen
混音师 Mixing Engineer：宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
